## Screenshot
#### A not so minimal sway Setup
![My i3 Setup](../screenshots/sway.png)

## Install

this version requires GNU [stow](https://www.gnu.org/software/stow/)

```console
$ pacman -S stow
$ ./install
$ stow .
```
